title: NFL ATL: Championship Sunday preview; Robert Quinn interview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Championship Sunday preview; Robert Quinn interview
description:
A room full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- preview the AFC and NFC title games and catch up in studio with St. Louis Rams defensive end Robert Quinn, who states his case for NFL Defensive Player of the Year and helps break down Sunday's showdowns. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
